response.overview: Dale, a truck driver takes a three and a half century old cursed amulet from Tiffany's jewelry box. Not knowing that it is cursed, Dale begins having nightmares and seeing visions of the apocalypse. Azazel eventually appears to Dale and possesses him. Azazel gives Dale a ring that will absorb human souls and demands Dale to kill humans. Azazel needs to become powerful enough to crossover our worlds to create HELL ON EARTH! Will he succeed and plunge our existence into The Heart of Hell?
response.title: The Heart of Hell
